## Introduction {data-background="images/bg_slide.png"}

::: incremental
- had a [tech / science blog](https://pschmidtke.github.io/blog/) based on fastai/fastpages hosted on gh-pages
    - able to render jupyter notebooks to web
    - easy to write with markdown + add code & interactive elements
    - support for 3D viewer & data viz
:::
::: {.fragment .fade-up}
- fastpages got discontinued 
![sad](https://media.tenor.com/xbyncXg-zW8AAAAC/sad-emotional.gif){.absolute top=0 left=550}
:::

## What is ![quarto logo](https://quarto.org/quarto.png){.absolute top=-10 left=250} {data-background="images/bg_slide.png"} 

An open-source scientific and technical publishing system

::: incremental 
- Authoring using Jupyter notebooks or markdown
- Dynamic content with Python, R, Julia & Observable
- Publish reproducible articles, presentations, websites, blogs & books
    - HTML, PDF, Word, ePub ...
- Connection to publishing hubs like confluence etc
- Support for pandoc markdown (citations, equations, refs, callouts) :heart_eyes:
::: 

## Installation{data-background="images/bg_slide.png"}


```{=html}
<iframe width="100%" height="700" src="https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/" title="Quarto Documentation"></iframe>
```


## First steps{data-background="images/bg_slide.png"}


```{bash}
quarto help

  Usage:   quarto 
  Version: 1.3.313

  Description:

    Quarto CLI

  Options:

    -h, --help     - Show this help.                            
    -V, --version  - Show the version number for this program.  

  Commands:

    render          [input] [args...]     - Render files or projects to various document types.        
    preview         [file] [args...]      - Render and preview a document or website project.          
    serve           [input]               - Serve a Shiny interactive document.                        
    create          [type] [commands...]  - Create a Quarto project or extension                       
    create-project  [dir]                 - Create a project for rendering multiple documents          
    convert         <input>               - Convert documents to alternate representations.            
    pandoc          [args...]             - Run the version of Pandoc embedded within Quarto.          
    run             [script] [args...]    - Run a TypeScript, R, Python, or Lua script.                
    add             <extension>           - Add an extension to this folder or project                 
    install         [target...]           - Installs an extension or global dependency.                
    publish         [provider] [path]     - Publish a document or project. Available providers include:
    check           [target]              - Verify correct functioning of Quarto installation.         
    help            [command]             - Show this help or the help of a sub-command.  
``` 



## First example{data-background="images/bg_slide.png"}

I want to discuss a topic or a paper  

![](https://media.tenor.com/gzpXxKAKfp0AAAAC/minions-blah-blah-blah.gif){width=200 height=200}

::: incremental

- I need text, citations and referrals
    - markdown, citations, links
:::

## Input Markdown file (qmd)

```{.md}
---
bibliography: references.bib
date: '2022-11-07'
description: A (long) comment on current pitfalls on binding site comparison papers & their benchmarking
image: toc_image.png
title: Binding site comparison - current benchmark issues
toc: true
---

# Intro

...

```
